mapper.insert:
insert into basicinfo( id, device_name, device_ip, account, terminal_ip, terminalMAC, aim_ip, visit_website, visit_url, terminal_info, visit_time, source_port, aim_port, network_delay, van ) values
(#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{deviceName},#{deviceIp},#{account},#{terminalIp},#{terminalMAC},#{aimIp},#{visitWebsite},#{visitUrl}, #{terminalInfo},#{visitTime,#{sourcePort},#{aimPort},#{networkDelay},#{van})
